sentences.en: All ears were cocked for the footsteps on the stairs.
sentences.cn: 所有的人都竖起耳朵听楼梯上传来的脚步声。

sentences.en: At the top of the stairs stood the white-coated doctors.
sentences.cn: 一群穿着白大褂的医生站在楼梯顶上。

sentences.en: Charlie humped his rucksack up the stairs to his flat.
sentences.cn: 查利费力地将背包背到楼上自己的公寓里。

sentences.en: Eva testified to having seen Herndon with his gun on the stairs.
sentences.cn: 伊娃作证称看见过赫恩登持枪站在楼梯上。

sentences.en: He picked up his suitcase and climbed the stairs.
sentences.cn: 他拎起手提箱,爬上了楼梯.

sentences.en: I hit him back and he somersaulted down the stairs.
sentences.cn: 我还手打了他，他顺着楼梯滚了下去。

sentences.en: I ran up the stairs and saw Alison lying at the top.
sentences.cn: 我跑上楼梯，见艾莉森躺在那里。

sentences.en: I struggled into a bathrobe and staggered down the stairs.
sentences.cn: 我挣扎着穿上浴衣，踉跄地下了楼。

sentences.en: Llewelyn was mounting the stairs up into the keep.
sentences.cn: 卢埃林登上台阶，走进城堡主楼。

sentences.en: Niccolini was thundering up the stairs, taking them two at a time.
sentences.cn: 尼科利尼一步两个台阶地噔噔跑上楼。

sentences.en: She lay at the bottom of the stairs, whimpering in pain.
sentences.cn: 她躺在楼梯底部，痛得呜咽着。

sentences.en: She missed her footing and fell headlong down the stairs.
sentences.cn: 她一脚踩空，头朝下摔下了楼梯。

sentences.en: She ran up the stairs, her bare feet thudding on the wood.
sentences.cn: 她光着脚噔噔地跑上木质楼梯。

sentences.en: The  boy thumped down the stairs.
sentences.cn: 小男孩咚咚地跑下楼梯。

sentences.en: The children pattered down the stairs.
sentences.cn: 孩子们啪嗒啪嗒地跑下楼梯。

sentences.en: The girl students romped down the stairs.
sentences.cn: 女学生们轻快地跑下楼梯。

sentences.en: The suitcase bounced down the stairs.
sentences.cn: 衣箱一路颠跳着滚下楼梯。

sentences.en: They chased down the stairs into the narrow, dirty street.
sentences.cn: 他们冲下楼梯，来到狭窄、肮脏的街上。

sentences.en: Without thinking, she pelted down the stairs in her nightgown.
sentences.cn: 她想都没想，穿着睡衣就飞奔下了楼。

trans.tran_cn: 楼梯，楼梯（ stair的名词复数 ），（楼梯的）一级，阶
trans.tran_en: a flight of steps leading from one storey or level to another, esp indoors
